edu.bridgewater.mcmaze

Class DBInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bridgewater.mcmaze.DBInterface

  • public class DBInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the connection with the MySQL database used to load map information. It sends and receives queries and provides access to the results to other classes.
    Author:
    Charles German

    • Method Detail

      • establishConnection

        public static void establishConnection(java.lang.String dbName,
                                       java.lang.String adminUser,
                                       java.lang.String adminPass)
                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                       java.sql.SQLException
        Establish a connection to a database (each map is represented by a separate database)
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database
        adminUser - the username of the root user in MySQL
        adminPass - the password for adminUser
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if com.mysql.jdbc.Driver is not found
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs when connecting

      • loadMap

        public static void loadMap(java.lang.String mapFileName)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                           java.sql.SQLException
        Load SQL code from a map file into memory and create the MySQL database
        Parameters:
        mapFileName - the file name of the map file to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an issue reading the file
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If there is an issue casting file header information to int values
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If there is an issue casting file header information and SQL code to String values
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a problem creating the MySQL database

      • getRoom

        public static Room getRoom(int roomID)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        get a room with the given id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room to get
        Returns:
        the Room object for the room with that id or null if no such room exists
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem

      • getAdjacentRooms

        public static Room[] getAdjacentRooms(int roomID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        get a room adjacent to the room with the given id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room adjacent to the target room
        Returns:
        an array of Room objects for the room adjacent to the given room, or an empty(?) array if no such rooms can be found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem

      • getAdjacentRoom

        public static Room getAdjacentRoom(int roomID,
                                   int edgeID)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        get the room adjacent to the room with the given room id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the known room id, the desired room DOES NOT have this room id
        edgeID - the edge id of the edge containing both the given room id and the desired room id
        Returns:
        the room in the edge with the given id which DOES NOT have the given room id or null if the room can't be found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem

      • getAdjacentRoomByEdgeType

        public static Room getAdjacentRoomByEdgeType(int roomID,
                                             int edgeType)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        get the room adjacent to the room with the given id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the known room id, the desired room DOES NOT have this room id
        edgeType - the edge type containing both the given room id and the desired room id
        Returns:
        the room in the edge with the given type which DOES NOT have the given room id or null if the room or edge can't be found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem

      • getEdges

        public static Edge[] getEdges(int roomID)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        get all edges which contain the given room id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the id of the room which MUST be in the edges
        Returns:
        all edges which contain the given room id
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem

      • getExits

        public static int[] getExits(int roomID)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        get all valid exits (integer representation) for the room with the given id
        Parameters:
        roomID - the room to examine
        Returns:
        an array of integers, containing all of the valid exits (integer representation)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is a SQL problem
